verses.verse: In the end <S%G3796><s%> of the sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> as it began to dawn <S%G2020><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> the first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G243><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> to see <S%G2334><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sepulcher. <S%G5028><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake: <S%G4578><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and came <S%G4334><s%> and rolled back <S%G617><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door, <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1883><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> countenance <S%G2397><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> lightning, <S%G796><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> raiment <S%G1742><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> snow: <S%G5510><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> for <S%G575><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> keepers <S%G5083><s%> did shake, <S%G4579><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> men.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> ye: <S%G5210><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which was crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

He is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> here: <S%G5602><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he is risen, <S%G1453><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he said. <S%G2036><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> lay. <S%G2749><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and tell <S%G2036><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he is risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead; <S%G3498><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> he goeth before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall ye see <S%G3700><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> lo, <S%G2400><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they departed <S%G1831><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sepulcher <S%G3419><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> joy; <S%G5479><s%> and did run <S%G5143><s%> to bring his disciples word. <S%G518><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3101><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they went <S%G4198><s%> to tell <S%G518><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> met <S%G528><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> All hail. <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and held <S%G2902><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Be not afraid: <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3361><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> tell <S%G518><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and there <S%G2546><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> were going, <S%G4198><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> watch <S%G2892><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and showed <S%G518><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the things that were done. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they were assembled <S%G4863><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> had taken <S%G2983><s%> counsel, <S%G4824><s%> they gave <S%G1325><s%> large <S%G2425><s%> money <S%G694><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> soldiers, <S%G4757><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> ye, His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> and stole <S%G2813><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away while we <S%G2257><s%> slept. <S%G2837><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> come to the governor's ears, <S%G191><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G2232><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> will persuade <S%G3982><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> secure <S%G4160><s%> <S%G275><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> money, <S%G694><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they were taught: <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> is commonly reported <S%G1310><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> this day. <S%G4594><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> eleven <S%G1733><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went away <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had appointed <S%G5021><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> doubted. <S%G1365><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and spake <S%G2980><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Go <S%G4198><s%> ye therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and teach <S%G3100><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%>

Teaching <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to observe <S%G5083><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> I have commanded <S%G1781><s%> you: <S%G5213><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> lo, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> always, <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2250><s%> even unto <S%G2193><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G4930><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
